==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|親|母}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|おやは|おふくろ}}

# [[old woman]]
# [[mother]]

====Usage notes====
Similar to English usage of {{m|en|old woman}}, meaning both "''an unrelated older woman''" and "''one’s own mother''."

Word is relatively masculine in usage; a man is likely to use it to refer to his own mother.
